title: Andrea del Sarto - saying "and I could alter it"

content.question: In saying “and I could alter it” (line 12), the speaker is

choices.label: expressing a desire to change his way of life
commenting on the social conditions of his time
resolving to become as great as Rafael

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
